bedroom.name: Master Bedroom
bedroom.description: You are in the Master Bedroom that feels worn-out, the air is quiet and a bit musty.

bat.name: Wooden Bat
bat.description: Wooden bat leaning against the wall

bed.name: Bed
bed.description: an old, creaky BED that has seen better days

dresser.name: Dresser
dresser.description: A DRESSER sitting in the corner with chipped paint and worn-out handles.

couch.name: Couch
couch.description: A dusty old couch with a bunch of holes and stains

tvstand.name: TV Stand
tvstand.description: A dilapidated tv stand holding an ancient television

rug.name: Rug
rug.description: A worn, rug with faded intricate patterns sprawls across the creaky wooden floor

library.name: Library
library.description: The library, a place where learning can occur, I wonder if there is anything that I could learn here

bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
bookshelf.description: One creaky wooden bookshelf, full of books

desk.name: Desk
desk.descirption: Your standard desk, used for reading and writing.

chair.name: Chair
chair.description: In the corner there is one comfy looking chair that is used for reading
